Articles.Content: Banned for having just one line of text in your signature.
Banned for posting after going extinct over a million years ago.

Banned for ignorance. :-I

They continued to evolve and live to the modern day as "sharks". He was just named after his great-great-great-great-great-great-....................................great-great-grampa.

Banned for gif avatar.

Megalodon was actually the dead end for the Carcharocles line of sharks, it and the Great White evolved from Cretoxyrhina but after that the line of evolution split into what would one day create the Great White shark, the other evolved into Otodus Obliquus. It then evolved into Carcharocles Angustidens, then Carcharocles Auriculatus, then into Carcharocles Chubutensis and finally into C. Megalodon, the most powerful and devastating predator the world has ever seen.
Banned for facts.

Banned for mistaking facts for theories.

Actually I probably should have put that in there.
